problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Modern productivity tools (Google Calendar, Notion, Todoist) have three critical flaws:

staticity.title: Staticity
staticity.description: They don't know that your circumstances or energy level have changed. Uncompleted tasks accumulate, causing feelings of guilt.

sunkCost.title: Sunk Cost Fallacy
sunkCost.description: They keep tasks that have already lost relevance, forcing users to do unnecessary work.

startParalysis.title: Start Paralysis
startParalysis.description: They require users to come up with an action plan themselves when they only have an abstract idea.

solution.title: Solution: Flux OS
solution.description: Flux OS is an AI assistant that combines strategic planning (Generative AI) and tactical execution (Adaptive Scheduling).
solution.subDescription: It doesn't just tell you when to do a task, but also asks whether it's worth doing at all.

generativeAI.title: Generative AI
generativeAI.description: Creates strategic plans from abstract ideas, breaking down big goals into actionable steps.

adaptivePlanning.title: Adaptive Planning
adaptivePlanning.description: Constantly recalculates the schedule based on your energy level, available time, and changed circumstances.

userJourney.title: User Journey
userJourney.description: Persona: Alex, a developer, wants to launch a startup but works full-time.

monday.title: Plan Creation
monday.description: Alex writes in Flux: "I want to launch an MVP app for financial tracking". Flux generates a plan: "Competitor Analysis", "Figma Prototype", "Database Setup". Alex approves the plan.

tuesday.title: Adaptation to Circumstances
tuesday.description: Alex was delayed at his main job. Energy is at zero. The system sees that the evening is busy and automatically removes the "Figma Prototype" task (because it requires creativity). Instead, it suggests: "Watch 2 videos about competitors" (Low Energy).

friday.title: Strategy Reassessment
friday.description: Alex realizes that no one uses apps, everyone is on Telegram bots. He marks the "Mobile App" hypothesis as irrelevant. Flux asks: "Delete React Native tasks and replace them with a Telegram bot development plan?". Alex presses "Yes". The calendar is cleared of clutter.
